explains: v. 热煨（roast 的过去分词）
wordGroup: roasted peanut 烤花生，烘干花生

sentences.en: She roasted the meat on a spit.
sentences.cn: 她在烤肉扦子上烤了那块肉。

sentences.en: The law roasted her to death at a slow fire.
sentences.cn: 法官用慢火把她烤死了。

sentences.en: The roasted sweet potatoes are kept in a heated "box" outside the shop.
sentences.cn: 烤过的红薯放在店外一个加热的“盒子”里。
